title: LINE app : quarterly revenue 2012 to 2015
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '12.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 27.8 more Revenue in billion yen than the lowest Quarter Q4 '12.
min_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '15 has the highest Revenue in billion yen and Q4 '12 has the lowest Revenue in billion yen.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '12.
The highest Quarter Q4 '15 has 27.8 more Revenue in billion yen than the lowest Quarter Q4 '12.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion yen in the y axis.
The Revenue in billion yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '12.
Quarter Q3 '15 has the second highest value for Revenue in billion yen.
The difference of Revenue in billion yen between the highest and lowest Quarter is 27.8.
Quarter Q4 '15 is higher than any other Quarters with value 30.0, followed by Q3 '15, and Q1 '15. Down to Quarter Q4 '12 with the lowest value 2.2.
The Revenue in billion yen has declined over the past 13 Quarters.
The Quarter Q4 '15 has 1.74 times more Revenue in billion yen than average.
